Name: Sculptor's mallet
Description: Stone was worked using bronze and copper chisels (see for example E.2480 and E.2543) and wooden mallets. This specimen is one with an elongated head (compare with the mallets with pear-shaped heads; E.1106, E.1952, E.4414 and E.4416) and was used for finer work, such as putting the finishing touches to statues.
